titles.title: A joint resolution designating the week of March 8, 1987, through March 14, 1987, as "Girl Scouts of the United States of America Week".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 2/11/1987--Introduced. Designates the week of March 8 through March 14, 1987, as Girl Scouts of the United States of America Week.
